body.name: 8 Inch Nonstick Frying Pan Skillet, Non Stick Ceramic Frying Pan with Bamboo Spatula, Egg Pan Omelette pan, Stay Cool Handle, Induction Compatible, 100% PFOA Free, Turquoise
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Healthy Ceramic Pan】M MELENTA non stick frying pan features long-lasting natural ceramic nonstick coating, makes cooking an enjoyable thing and cleaning a breeze. 100% free of PTFE/ PFOA/lead/cadmium. Enjoy healthier and easier cooking with our ceramic nonstick skillet

【8 Inch Frying Pan】This cute frying pan can be used as an egg pan/omelet pan/pancake pan with less oil. Non toxic induction pan is equipped with ergonomic bakelite handle, which is comfortable to grip and stays cool while cooking. Beautiful turquoise color adds a pop of color to any kitchen. 1 Piece natural bamboo spatula is included

【Super Nonstick & Easy To Clean】The cookware ceramic surface is smooth and super nonstick, eggs can just slide right off the pan easily. Nothing sticks! Cleaning is also a piece of cake, simply wipe to clean or rinse with water. Hand wash is recommended to extend the non stick surface life

【Quick & Even Heating】This induction frying pan is crafted from heavy-duty aluminum body, heats up quickly and evenly. Fry pan adopts high magnetic conductive steel base, which is compatible with all cooktops including induction. Low heat is recommended while cooking

【Service & Guarantee】M MELENTA nonstick pan passed strict inspection process. In case you received defect items caused by delivery, please don't hesitate to contact our 24/7 online customer service which will reply to you within 24 hours to solve your doubt. Guarantee extend to 6 months for quality issue

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: M MELENTA 8" Frying Pan Skillet 2Pcs Nonstick Cookware Set - one 8 inch frying pan and one bamboo spatula.

M MELENTA Frying Pan Series Cook Healthy & Safe Enjoy Healthy Cooking - M MELENTA cookware is 100% free of PFOA, PFOS, PTFE, lead, cadmium, and other heavy metals. Pan for Everyday Cooking - Ideal for sautéing, searing, browning, and frying, this 8 inch frying pan is a versatile addition to any kitchen.

Excellent Nonstick Performance! Premium natural ceramic coating provides you with long-lasting nonstick performance. Cleaning is a Breeze! Upgraded nonstick ceramic makes cleaning a piece of cake - Simply wipe or rinse to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking pan
reviews.reviewText: I think the pan is very sturdy and looks wonderful, however, I thought that it had a lid, and it does not, so I returned it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Non-Stick Frying Pans Set, including an 8" and 10" Ceramic Frying Pan Skillet. Here's my review:**Design and Construction (4.5/5):**The design of the Non-Stick Frying Pans is sleek and practical. The set includes two sizes – 8" and 10", providing versatility for different cooking needs. The ceramic coating adds a modern touch, and the stay-cool handles are a thoughtful feature for easy handling.**Non-Stick Performance (4.5/5):**The non-stick performance of these pans is impressive. Cooking eggs, pancakes, and other delicate items is a breeze, and the food easily slides off the surface without sticking. The ceramic coating also makes cleaning relatively easy, requiring minimal effort to remove residue.**Heat Distribution (4/5):**The heat distribution of the pans is decent, ensuring even cooking. The ceramic construction allows for quick and efficient heating, contributing to a consistent cooking experience. However, users should be mindful of not using excessively high heat, as it may impact the longevity of the non-stick coating.**Durability (4/5):**The overall durability of the Non-Stick Frying Pans appears to be good. The construction feels solid, and the ceramic coating holds up well to regular use. However, users should follow the care instructions to preserve the non-stick properties and prevent scratching.**Stay Cool Handles (4.5/5):**The stay-cool handles are a practical feature, allowing for safe and comfortable handling while cooking. The ergonomic design adds to the overall user experience. It's worth noting that, while the handles stay cool during stovetop cooking, caution should be taken when using them in the oven.**Versatility (4/5):**The versatility of this frying pan set is noteworthy. The two different sizes cater to various cooking needs, from preparing individual portions to larger meals. They are suitable for a range of stovetops, excluding induction.**Ease of Care (4.5/5):**Caring for these frying pans is convenient. The non-stick surface makes cleaning relatively easy, and they are dishwasher safe. However, handwashing is recommended to prolong the life of the non-stick coating.**Affordability (4/5):**Considering the design, non-stick performance, heat distribution, durability, stay-cool handles, versatility, ease of care, and overall satisfaction, the Non-Stick Frying Pans Set offers good value for their price. The affordability aligns well with the features provided, making them a practical addition to a kitchen.**Overall Satisfaction (4.3/5):**My overall satisfaction with the Non-Stick Frying Pans Set is positive. They perform well for everyday cooking, and the addition of two sizes enhances their practicality.In conclusion, if you're in search of non-stick frying pans that offer a balance of performance and affordability, the Non-Stick Frying Pans Set is a recommended choice. They cater to a variety of cooking needs and provide a reliable non-stick experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional
reviews.reviewText: I really like these nonstick pans a lot. My old Teflon ones were looking pretty bad, and these were exactly what I was looking for. I have two sons and they cook everything on high heat despite my guidance. The recommended heat for these pans is low to medium and not to use any metal utensils with them. Of course, just today, I came home to my youngest using metal tongs while cooking bacon in them. This is why we can't have nice things. I'm hoping he didn't do any damage to them. The nonstick quality is very nice, and I hope they hold up longer than my last set. I've been using them for a few weeks now and everything I've made has cooked really evenly and washing them was a breeze. I usually wash them by hand, but you can put them in the dishwasher too. The handles started getting a little loose but a quick little tightening with a Phillips head screwdriver fixed that.The set I got also came with a couple wooden cooking utensils which was a nice addition. I've been using those with the pans as well.Overall, I think these pans are a nice addition to your cookware. I realize they are not going to last as long as stainless steele or cast-iron pans, but any nonstick pan has a short lifespan compared to those others. I still think it's a worthwhile purchase and these pans not only work well but they are beautiful as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Splash of Culinary Brilliance
reviews.reviewText: The Non-Stick Frying Pans Set in Turquoise has revolutionized my cooking experience, earning its well-deserved 5-star rating for its exceptional performance, stylish design, and the thoughtful inclusion of bamboo utensils.First and foremost, the non-stick prowess of these pans is unparalleled. From delicate omelettes to searing meats, these pans deliver flawless results without a hint of sticking. The ceramic coating not only ensures easy food release but also adds a vibrant and stylish touch to my kitchen, thanks to the eye-catching turquoise color.The set includes an 8" and 10" frying pan, offering versatility for various cooking needs. The sizes are perfect for everyday use, and the stay-cool handles provide a comfortable and safe grip, even when the pans are sizzling hot. The induction compatibility adds to the overall versatility, making these pans suitable for a range of stovetops.The addition of bamboo utensils is a thoughtful touch. Not only are they eco-friendly, but they also work seamlessly with the non-stick surface of the pans, ensuring that I can whip up culinary delights without worrying about scratching or damaging the coating.The 100% PFOA-free construction is a testament to the commitment to health-conscious cooking. It's reassuring to know that these pans prioritize safety without compromising on performance.Cleanup is a breeze, thanks to the non-stick surface, and the pans maintain their vibrant color and quality even after repeated use. The durability of the construction is evident, promising longevity in the kitchen.In conclusion, the Non-Stick Frying Pans Set in Turquoise is a 5-star addition to any kitchen. Its exceptional non-stick performance, stylish design, and the inclusion of bamboo utensils make it a standout choice. I highly recommend this frying pan set to fellow Amazon shoppers – it's a splash of culinary brilliance that enhances both form and function in the kitchen. Cheers to effortless cooking and stylish kitchens!
